title: Knife, ca. 1730
markings: On ferrule: dagger; The Netherlands, 1814-1953, Antiques; Tardy, SILVER, 1981, p. 321 illegible mark on blade; unidentified cutlers' mark
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade has straight lower edge, upper edge curving downwards to the point. Tapering handle, oval in section, engraved with floral pattern. Plain ferrule, top of handle has ribbed pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1730.
ca. 1730. shark skin, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-138-b.
